applied.subject: Course application - created
applied.body: You have applied for a course: '{course}'. You will be notified when the status of your application changes.

eligible.subject: Course application - reviewed by FLAW
eligible.body: Your application for course: '{course}' has been reviewed and approved by the department that handles courses at Faculty of Law, Comenius University in Bratislava. You will be notified when the status of your application changes.

accepted.subject: Course application - accepted
accepted.body: Congratulations! Your application for a course: '{course}' has been accepted. Further details about the course and the next steps will be shared with you shortly.

rejected.subject: Course application - rejected
rejected.body: We regret to inform you that your application for a course: '{course}' has not been successful. Thank you for your interest, and we encourage you to apply again in the future.
